          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Part 1 - The Family</string>
            <string language="en">Part 1 - The Family</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teil 1 - Die Familie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie 1 - La Famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte 1 - A Família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte 1 - La Famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος 1 - η οικογένεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parte 1 - La Familia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this part you learn many words, phrases and expressions that have to do with family.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">In this part you learn many words, phrases and expressions that have to do with family. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">family</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Teil erlernen Sie viele Wörter, 
Phrasen und Ausdrücke, die Familie miteinbeziehen. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la présente partie vous apprenez beaucoup 
de mots, expressions et expressions qui doivent faire avec la famille.
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les débutants - module 5 -
qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta parte você aprende muitas palavras, frases
e expressões que têm que fazer com família. Safir - vida do 
inglês e de funcionamento para os novatos - módulo 5 - que são 
você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa parte imparate molte parole, frasi ed 
espressioni che riguardano la famiglia. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μέρος μαθαίνετε πολλές λέξεις, φράσεις 
και εκφράσεις που πρέπει να κάνουν με την οικογένεια. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους -
ενότητα 5 - που είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta parte usted aprende muchas palabras, 
frases y expresiones que tengan que hacer con la familia. ¿Safir
- inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 5 - que son 
usted?</string>
          </description>
